name: Sam Tran
tagline: Web developer. Sometimes designer, digital poet, and writer.
body:
I'm a web developer and occasional designer working primarily in Scala, Java, JavaScript, and PHP.

When I'm taking a break from work, I'm fine-tuning my bread baking technique, researching digital poetics, or working on my impression of Stephen Fry's impression of Brian Blessed.

Contact me at samvtran@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
